list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Just did: Comment modal stying changed to match the system UI, shows the user profile image along with username and comment
To do: User should be able to make a comment on the page increasing the comment Count. Change the layout styling as I don't like the way it looks.

task.summary: changed code to match new post DB structure

Object data can be captured into const getCommentLike
To do: Data captured needs to be put into a flalist Should also get the username of people that commented User can comment on a post
Created a function that gets the comments, stores the users name and profileimage

Just did: Comment showing via each post with username and comment made
To do: Style the comments page, function should only work if the bottom sheet is open to reduce unnecessary cached data
To do: User should be able to make a comment on the page increasing the comment Count.

To do: User should be able to make a comment on the page increasing the comment Count. Change the layout styling as I don't like the way it looks.
